summary: A young woman turns to the supernatural to wreak revenge on an murderous warlord.
cast: Kôjirô Hongô|Naomi Kobayashi|Mitsuyo Kamei|Yôko Atsuta|Yûtarô Ban|Jun Fujikawa|Seishirô Hara|Teruyo Higashiyama|Yukio Horikita|Tadashi Iwata|Kiyoshi Kasuga|Akane Kawasaki|Gen Kuroki|Kyôko Miwa|Ikuko Môri|Shôzô Nanbu|Shintarô Nanjô|Natsuko Oka|Eigorô Onoe|Yorie Santô|Chiaki Shirakawa|Shôsaku Sugiyama|Kazue Tamaki|Yûsaku Terashima|Akihisa Toda|Rokkô Toura|Kôichi Uenoyama|Katsura Wada
keywords: possessed by evil spirit|ritual suicide|killing a fish|woman's revenge|ghost cat
title: Hiroku kaibyô-den
